lore: The Genetic Anomaly can store a vast array of objects and creatures within itself, slowly consuming them and absorbing the nutrients it can process. Preferring dark, damp environments like sewers, it is incredibly stealthy, allowing it to hunt without its prey ever knowing until it's too late. When its DNA merges with another creature's, it produces a substance capable of replicating some of their traits if consumed.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Genetic Anomaly
